channel.title: NPC Spawning
channel.description:
Quite a rookie error I must admit but I cannot help but feel I'm missing something obvious despite how simple it is. My base is Project Insanity and when I try to add an NPC into my spawns.cfg they don't appear after saving, compiling and getting no batch errors at all. This is my spawn layout:
[code]// npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description Spawn = 278 3207 3213 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 741 3209 3221 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 882 3202 3424 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 6135 3218 3430 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 670 3222 3476 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 1 3224 3218 0 0 0 0 0 Man[/code]
None of the NPCs appear in game. Height level has been checked and everything. All help appreciated <3

item.title: NPC Spawning
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

Host Gushers:

Oh yeah i forgot to tell u this if your new to java,coding you should first go on google and search java for dummies…It teaches you alot and one of them says that java is case sensitive…

This actually doesn’t have much to do with java, it’s just more about the way it’s reading the cfg file. If you write out the cfg file to match the reader, it should be fine. There is no java issue here.

Read full topic

Oh yeah i forgot to tell u this if your new to java,coding you should first go on google and search java for dummies…It teaches you alot and one of them says that java is case sensitive…

just no.
Also this is was a cfg problem dumb

item.title: NPC Spawning
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“The Unholy, post:1, topic:467620”]// npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description Spawn = 278 3207 3213 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 741 3209 3221 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 882 3202 3424 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 6135 3218 3430 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 670 3222 3476 0 0 0 0 0 Fish Spawn = 1 3224 3218 0 0 0 0 0 Man[/quote]

// npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 278 3207 3213 0 0 0 0 0 Fish spawn = 741 3209 3221 0 0 0 0 0 Fish spawn = 882 3202 3424 0 0 0 0 0 Fish spawn = 6135 3218 3430 0 0 0 0 0 Fish spawn= 670 3222 3476 0 0 0 0 0 Fish spawn = 1 3224 3218 0 0 0 0 0 Man

Don’t capitalize the “s”.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Spawning
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:7, topic:467620”]Spaces and tabs are ignored in Java and do not affect anything.

Unholy, I think your compiling won’t work. Is this the only thing not being compiled?[/quote]
Cfg files dont need to be compiled for god sake.
OT: Are those npcs the only thing you have on that file?..

Read full topic

item.description:

Spaces and tabs are ignored in Java and do not affect anything.

Unholy, I think your compiling won’t work. Is this the only thing not being compiled?
